pythagoras.f
Class QuadCurve

java.lang.Object
  pythagoras.f.AbstractQuadCurve
      pythagoras.f.QuadCurve
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, IQuadCurve, IShape
public class QuadCurve
extends AbstractQuadCurve
implements Serializable

Represents a quadratic curve.

See Also:

Constructor Summary
QuadCurve()
          Creates a quad curve with all points at (0,0).

          Creates a quad curve with the specified start, control, and end points.
